verbs.description: [V: is] [ARG2: targets iraq embassy in kabul] all 4 attackers killed the islamic state group targeted the iraqi embassy in kabul on monday with a suicide bomber blowing himself up outside the gates followed by three gunmen who stormed into the building the afghanistan foreign ministry kabul iraq embassy iraqi embassy afghan interior ministry najib danish iraq ahmad jamal
